pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data and Software for "Lessons in Statistical Thinking" // "Lessons in Statistical Thinking" D.T. Kaplan (2014) https://dtkaplan.github.io/Lessons-in-statistical-thinking/ is a textbook for a first or second course in statistics that embraces data wrangling, causal reasoning, modeling, statistical adjustment, and simulation. 'LSTbook' supports the student-centered, tidy, pipeline-oriented computing style featured in the book.
